name: Acid - Jumper
description:
This is a  2D-  Neon - Platformer made in 1.5 weeks In the Unity Game Engine

this is just a prototype its got 2 levels and is around 1-2 minutes long with no deaths.

its quite buggy but was made in around 1 and a half weeks.

i hope you have fun .

please leave feedback in the comments.
